```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
library(DT)
# Install thematic and un-comment for themed static plots (i.e., ggplot2)
# thematic::thematic_rmd()
data_with_monthly_expenses <- readRDS("data/2022-11-06-full-data")
```

```{r include = FALSE}
pretty_data <- data_with_monthly_expenses %>%
  mutate(title = paste0("<a href='",url,"'>",title,"</a>"),
         location = str_remove(location, ", $")) %>%
  select(-lowercase_title, -hourly, -monthly, -joint, -monthly_expenses, -url) 

colnames(pretty_data) <- str_to_title(colnames(pretty_data))
```

```{r}
datatable(pretty_data %>%
            rename("% of Income to Housing" = "Housing_share",
                   "Monthly Rent/Mortgage" = "Rent_mortgage"),
          options = list(paging = TRUE,    
                         pageLength = 20, 
                         scrollX = TRUE,   
                         scrollY = TRUE,  
                         autoWidth = TRUE,
                         server = FALSE,  
                         # defines position of elements on the table
                         dom = 'frtipB',
                         buttons = c('csv', 'excel')
          ),
          extensions = 'Buttons',
          selection = 'single', 
          filter = 'top',           
          rownames = FALSE,
          escape = FALSE
) %>%
  formatPercentage("% of Income to Housing") %>%
  formatCurrency(c("Salary", "Monthly Rent/Mortgage"), digits = 0)
```
